name: Joe Cobb

topics.topic_text: GREETING
topics.response_text: We've got people to kill. Keep an eye out.

topics.topic_text: PLAYER FIRE WEAPON
topics.response_text: Knock it off!

topics.topic_text: PLAYER IN IRON SITES
topics.response_text: Go ahead. Try me.

topics.topic_text: PLAYER LAY MINE
topics.response_text: Why the fuck you puttin' that there?

topics.topic_text: PLAYER THROW GRENADE
topics.response_text: Grenade!

topics.topic_text: What say I help you take over this town?
topics.response_text: {player helping Ringo}No. I got a funny feeling about you, and there's no way I'm trusting you to watch my back.

topics.topic_text: Deal.
topics.response_text: While you're doing that, I'll be here waiting for my friends. Join up with us once you're done.

topics.topic_text: Never mind. I need to think about this.
topics.response_text: Fuck you, then.

topics.topic_text: You can't find Ringo yourself?
topics.response_text: There are too many places to hide around here. He'd see me coming and then "bam", I'm dead.

topics.topic_text: Here - the spare medical supplies from Doc Mitchell.
topics.response_text: All right! We got all sorts of shit in here. Nice job. Better take some for yourself in case you get hit.

topics.topic_text: What's been going on in the rest of the wasteland?
topics.response_text: Same old shit that's been going on for years. The NCR and Legion are still fighting over Hoover Dam for some reason.

topics.topic_text: What do you know about the Legion?
topics.response_text: I've run with some tough gangs, but I gotta admit they all got nothing on the Legion. I hear they stick you up on poles and it takes awhile to die.

topics.topic_text: Goodbye.
topics.response_text: Yeah.

topics.topic_text: Tell me about the NCR.
topics.response_text: {contempt}"New" California Republic - nothing new about it. Just a bunch of people with money and power pushing everyone else around.

topics.topic_text: This area is your territory?
topics.response_text: {pride}It is now. Me and the rest of the guys busted out of the NCR prison east of here and took over. Now we're calling the shots.

topics.topic_text: What were you in prison for?
topics.response_text: None of your damn business. You ought to know better than to ask a man that kind of question.

topics.topic_text: I just need to know if I should watch my step around you.
topics.response_text: [SUCCEEDED]{listing his crimes}Robbed some people, burned some things, killed a few guys.

topics.topic_text: Never mind.
topics.response_text: {warning}Yeah, forget about it.

topics.topic_text: If you run the town, they'll have to work for you. Food, water, and money will be yours.
topics.response_text: {realizing player has a good idea}Shit, yeah. Mayor Cobb - I like the sound of that. Running my own town will give me more pull with the guys at the prison, too.

topics.topic_text: Free food, I guess.
topics.response_text: {thoughtful}Having all the food we want ain't a bad idea, actually. Getting sick of eating prison rations.

topics.topic_text: Forget I said anything.
topics.response_text: Make up your damn mind.

topics.topic_text: Do you know anything about Hoover Dam?
topics.response_text: Never been there since the NCR's got troops all over it. Must be pretty important.

topics.topic_text: I already took care of Ringo.
topics.response_text: No shit? I guess the next thing we need to do is hang out and wait for the rest of my gang to show up so we can talk about the plan.

topics.topic_text: I've done all I can. Let's take over Goodsprings.
topics.response_text: It's about time. I saw some of the townies gathering at the saloon, so we've got a militia to take down. We get rid of them and we own this place.

topics.topic_text: Ringo's dead. What now?
topics.response_text: Good. We'll still need a plan before we rush the town. I don't want to embarrass myself and get beat by a bunch of townies.

topics.topic_text: It's easy pickings. Why, you got somewhere else to be?
topics.response_text: Yeah, I guess me and the guys could push this place over pretty easily.

topics.topic_text: So what's next for you guys?
topics.response_text: I figure we'll hang around Goodsprings for awhile, maybe get some of the other gangs to join up with us.

topics.topic_text: What was that you said about Ringo?
topics.response_text: He's some trader who decided he'd rather shoot than pay the toll for being in our territory. He's hiding somewhere in town.

conversation.response_text: I'm done being nice. If you don't hand Ringo over soon, I'm going to get my friends and we're burning this town to the ground, got it?
What the hell is your problem?

description:
Joe Cobb is a 38 year-old African American Male.

Joe Cobb is the leader of a small gang of Powder Gangers operating along the Long 15 stretch between Sloan and Primm in 2281. A seasoned criminal with a reputation for toughness and strategic thinking, Cobb commands respect and loyalty from his fellow gangers.

Joe Cobb's Personality: Cobb is a hardened criminal with a pragmatic and ruthless approach to survival. He's a natural leader who commands respect through both his combat skills and his ability to make tough decisions. While not overtly cruel, he prioritizes his gang's interests above all else and isn't afraid to use violence to achieve his goals.

Joe Cobb's Backstory: Joe Cobb has been running with some of the toughest gangs the wasteland has seen for over a decade. His criminal career eventually led to his incarceration at the NCR Correctional Facility (NCRCF) where he was placed on a work-release program. Cobb took his freedom when Samuel Cooke triggered the massive prison break that allowed many Powder Gangers to escape. After breaking out, Cobb and his men salvaged armor from dead guards and established their territory along the Long 15, where they've been preying on travelers and caravans.
